item.title: What I learned from reading reactjs tests
item.description: First of all, I think React DOM is one of the most interesting part in React code base. I’m not sure if it is correct but whatever, stop thinking and start diving. This is the React-DOM test file at the time I’m writing this post. If you find latest version is different from what mentioned in this post please feel free to make a PR. ReactDOM should bubble onSubmit So we can listen an onsubmit event on a div.
